Reviews.Title: love my G3
Reviews.Author: Lynn M.
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived promptly and as described. Works great and was a great price. No problems with setup or operating or downloads

Reviews.Title: It's just fine
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: I like it just fine, while it is a huge step up from the flip phone I was using. word.

Reviews.Title: FM tuner is GONE
Reviews.Author: Dr. R. W. Mehler
Reviews.Content: I bought this model because it was supposed to be one of the very few with an FM tuner, a user changeable battery and an memory card slot. A phone with all three features is hard to find.Well, even harder than I had thought. The FM tuner is GONE from the latest software build. There appears to be no option for re-installing it.Back it goes.Update: I replaced it with an S4 Mini. That has all three and works great. Thanks to Amazon for a quick and painless refund.

Reviews.Title: El telefono llego dañado
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Quiero indicar que llevo dos semanas esperando el teléfono y cuando por fin me llega trae desperfectos en su funcionamiento, a penas lo prendí solo duro un par de horas y luego comenzó a fallar la pantalla, necesito la devolución del articulo por uno que este en buen estado como debería ser.I want to state that I have two weeks waiting for the phone and when I finally reached brings damage to its operation, barely lit it only lasted a couple of hours and then the screen started to fail, I need to return the item for one that is in good state should be.

Reviews.Title: El Producto nunca fue recibido
Reviews.Author: Victor López
Reviews.Content: Lamentablemente nunca recibi el producto por tal motivo no puedo brindar una evaluación acerca del mismo en lugar de lo que compre me llego un blackberry pearl 8110

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto!!!
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Garcia Salas
Reviews.Content: 100 % recomendados, llego en el tiempo que indicaron y en perfectas condiciones y sobre todo este es un excelente producto!!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente Equipo
Reviews.Author: David E. Franco
Reviews.Content: El diseño es muy elegante, muy rapido en internet y para la señal, el tamaño es el apropiado ademas el color es muy bonito.
